answers.answer: You should be evaluated for preeclampsia.Your urine needs to be checked for protein,  and as you say,  you should be evaluated for a possible early delivery.Did you tell your midwife you are having severe headaches?  You are exhibiting classic signs.I'd get these answers today -

I'm 35 weeks as well and have been dealing with the same issue.  My doctor doesn't play,  when my pressure gets high like that especially when accompanied by a headache he will send you to l&d for at least 24-48 hours for monitoring.  I've been hospitalized twice for this,  actually just got released today.  I think they should take it a little more serious as it could cause potential problems for you and baby.  I'm on strict bed rest by the way

question: I have had high blood pressure through out most of my pregnancy i am now 35wks. I started swelling really bad last week and at my apt yesterday my blood pressure had jumped even higher to 156/90. My mid wife didn't seem concerned at all she just re took it and made my appointments weekly now.  I can't seem to get rid of a head ache ive had for a couple days. Should i be worried??? My sister had this same problem and she had to be induced early because it got bad i just feel like my doctor was down playing the situation.
title: High Blood Pressure
